LogbackAppenderRegistrar
Spring component that registers the custom MongoLogAppender with Logback loggers once the application is ready.
LogEvent
Represents a log event stored in the MongoDB collection "logEvents".
LogEventRepository
Repository interface for accessing LogEvent documents in MongoDB.
LoggingController
 
LoggingService
Service class responsible for saving log events into MongoDB.
LoggingSettingBeans
Configuration class that defines Spring beans for managing asynchronous logging to Mongo Database.
LoggingVariables
Configuration class that fetches all configurations settings related to Thread Pool and Log Batching from application.properties using ConfigurationProperties.
MongoLogAppender
A custom Logback appender that batches log events and writes them to MongoDB asynchronously using a background thread pool.
MongoLogBuffer
Component that manages a buffer for LogEvent objects using a BlockingQueue.
